batchDisable.message: All running bots are about to stop. However, orders that have already been placed will not be automatically canceled. Are you sure you want to stop all bots?

hints.batchCreate: A bot will be created for each market (symbol + interval). Skipped if the wallet already has a bot in that market.
hints.intervalFirst: Select interval first, then choose a matching strategy
hints.strategyFiltered: Only strategies with the selected interval are shown
hints.symbolsOptional: Leave empty to create bots for all symbols

messages.resultSkipped: {count} bot(s) skipped (wallet already has a bot in those markets).

InsufficientBalanceMessage.calculation:
The required balance is the total of all active bots on this wallet:
Each bot requires = Max Amount per Trade × {multiplier}
InsufficientBalanceMessage.description: The wallet balance is insufficient to support all active bots. You cannot start this bot until the balance requirement is met.
InsufficientBalanceMessage.suggestion: Please deposit funds to cover the shortfall, or stop other bots to free up the required balance.

messages.walletActivating: Wallet is being activated, bots will be started once wallet is active

StrategyStepsInput.emptyState: No trade steps added yet. Click "Add Step" to create your first trade step.

buyMode.chaseUp:
Chase Up Mode (price > $0.50)
Unless you know your trading strategy well, this mode is not recommended as it may result in significant losses.

buy.maxChange: In Low Buy Mode, when the underlying price change exceeds this value, the bot will stop buying the corresponding token based on the price movement direction. Set to 0 to disable this limit.
buy.minChange: In Chase Up Mode, when the underlying price change falls below this value, the bot will stop buying. Set to 0 to disable this limit.
buy.once: Normally, within a trading cycle, if your previously bought position is fully sold, the bot will attempt to place another buy order. Enable this option if you only want to trade once per cycle.
buy.outcome: The trading outcome direction. Unless you are very confident about the future price direction, it is recommended to select both.
buy.price: The buy price per share for this trade. The lower the price, the higher your potential profit margin, and vice versa.
buy.size: The number of shares to buy. Shares multiplied by the buy price equals the total cost of this trade.
buy.timeRange: The valid time window for this buy order. Orders not filled beyond this time range will be cancelled.
buy.timeRangeChaseUp: In a trading cycle, after a certain point in time, the probability of outcome reversal drops significantly, making chasing up more likely to profit. Therefore, set the buy operation to start after this point.
buy.timeRangeLowBuy: In a trading cycle, after a certain point in time, the probability of outcome reversal drops significantly, making buying low more likely to lose. Therefore, set the buy operation to terminate before this point.

sell.price: The sell price per share for this trade. The higher the price, the higher your potential profit margin, and vice versa. If you set a price lower than the buy price, you may complete a losing trade.
sell.size: The number of shares to sell. Shares multiplied by the sell price equals the total amount you will receive from this trade.
sell.timeRange:
The valid time window for this sell order. Orders not filled beyond this time range will be cancelled.

The purpose of this time limit is to take profits early in the current trading cycle without keeping sell orders open until the market closes. Within a safe time range where the outcome is unlikely to change, you can cancel orders early to maximize profits.

hints.outcome: Select specific outcome or trade both
hints.timeRange: Start and end time in minutes (0-{max})

validation.timeRange: End time must be greater than start time

upgrade.description: Your remaining subscription value will be converted to days in the new plan. You only pay the difference.

DeleteModal.backupReminder: Before deleting, make sure you have exported and backed up your private key. Without the private key, you will permanently lose access to any funds in this wallet.
DeleteModal.message: Are you sure you want to delete wallet "{name}"?
DeleteModal.title: Delete Wallet
DeleteModal.warning: Deleting a wallet is irreversible. All wallet data will be permanently removed from our system.

DepositModal.note: The deposit address is {bridgeAddress} generated by Polymarket. You can send {supportedCrypto}, and funds will be automatically bridged to Polygon and converted to USDC.e. If you're sending USDC.e on Polygon directly (e.g., using our withdrawal feature), you can send funds directly to the Funder Address.
DepositModal.title: Deposit

create.description: A new wallet will be created with a unique private key. A Gnosis Safe contract will be deployed before trading starts.
create.title: Create New Wallet

ExportModal.confirmCheckbox: I understand the risks and want to export my private key
ExportModal.copyWarning:
Click the eye button to reveal your private key. Make sure no one is around you.
If you copy it to clipboard, remember to clear your clipboard afterwards to prevent leakage.
ExportModal.funderNotice: Note: Your funds are stored in the Funder Address (a Gnosis Safe contract), not the wallet address derived from this private key. The Funder Address is a smart contract controlled by your private key. If you import this key into a cryptocurrency wallet, you'll see a different address and won't find your assets there. To access your funds, {connectToPolymarket} and use the {withdraw} feature.
ExportModal.title: Export Private Key
ExportModal.warningDetail: Never share your private key with anyone. Anyone with access to your private key can steal all assets in your wallet.

ImportModal.description: Import an existing wallet using its private key. For new wallets, a Gnosis Safe contract will be deployed before trading starts.
ImportModal.title: Import Wallet

warning.description: Do not import private keys exported from Polymarket. These keys belong to Proxy Wallets (created via Email or Google login with MagicLink), and our service requires Gnosis Safe wallets.
warning.learnMore: Learn more about Polymarket wallet types

TransferModal.info: Transfer is processed via Polymarket Relayer (gasless). The transaction will be submitted immediately but may take a few minutes to confirm on-chain.
TransferModal.submitted: Transfer request submitted successfully. You can track the transaction status on PolygonScan.
TransferModal.title: Internal Transfer
TransferModal.toWalletHint: Select a wallet to transfer funds to
TransferModal.walletActivating: Your wallet needs to be activated before transfer. The activation and transfer will be processed automatically. This may take a few minutes. You can check the wallet address on PolygonScan to monitor progress.

WithdrawModal.info: Withdrawal is processed via Polymarket Relayer (gasless). The transaction will be submitted immediately but may take a few minutes to confirm on-chain.
WithdrawModal.submitted: Withdrawal request submitted successfully. You can track the transaction status on PolygonScan.
WithdrawModal.title: Withdraw
WithdrawModal.walletActivating: Your wallet needs to be activated before withdrawal. The activation and withdrawal will be processed automatically. This may take a few minutes. You can check the wallet address on PolygonScan to monitor progress.

tooltips.funderHelp: The Funder Address is your Polymarket Gnosis Safe wallet - a smart contract wallet deployed on Polygon that holds your positions and USDC.e. It's controlled by your EOA wallet and enables gasless transactions.
tooltips.inactive: Wallet will be automatically activated before trading starts.
